bibl.title: P. Trophitis: New Ptolemaic Papyri Relating to Egyptian Alimentary and Sale Contracts. Greek Abstracts from a 'Kibotos' Archive Edited and Analyzed.
bibl.note: P. Trophitis. Diss. Univ. of Texas at Austin. Summary in DA 50 (1989-1990) p. 3023-A. Collection of the Harry Ransom Center at UT-Austin. 25 papyri and 15 fragments. July 160-September 158 B.C.
Herring Donald Grant, P. Trophitis: New Ptolemaic Papyri Relating to Egyptian Alimentary and Sale Contracts. Greek Abstracts from a 'Kibotos' Archive Edited and Analyzed.
